articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Drive a Honda or Acura? Over 2.5 million cars are under recall due to fuel pump defect - ABC News
articles.description: Honda Motor’s American arm is recalling more than 2.5 million vehicles in the U.S. due to a fuel pump defect that can increase risks of engine failure or stalling while driving
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Honda Motor's American arm is recalling more than 2.5 million vehicles in the U.S. due to a fuel pump defect that can increase risks of engine failure or stalling while driving.
